ceterms:description: First-Year Application: Elonâ€™s first-year undergraduate application is online only. A credit card is required when you apply unless you have been issued a fee waiver.

ceterms:entryCondition.ceterms:name: Elon University Entry Conditions
ceterms:submissionOf: Completed Secondary School Report (included in the application)

ceterms:name: Elon University Admission Requirements

ceterms:condition: English: 4 units required (3 units must be completed for admissions consideration)
Math: 3 units required (Algebra I, Algebra II and Geometry), 4 recommended
Science: 3 or more units, including at least one lab science
Social Studies: 3 or more units, including U.S. History
Foreign Language: 2 units required, 3 recommended (Students who have not completed at least two units in one foreign language must complete a 121-level foreign language course at Elon.)
ceterms:recommends.ceterms:description: Applicants are encouraged to pursue the following throughout their four years of high school.
ceterms:recommends.ceterms:name: Applicant Recommendations
